txt.en: Your group is using the Round Robin loot rule with Master Looter setting. Every corpse will be assigned to a specific player in the group to loot. The game will select that player by going down the list of group members one at a time and restarting at the top of the list when everyone has been given a corpse to loot. Any items of or above the 'Loot Quality' level set by the group leader need to be assigned to members of the party by the party leader.

Your fellowship is using the Round Robin loot rule with Master Looter setting. Every corpse will be assigned to a specific player in the fellowship to loot. The game will select that player by going down the list of fellowship members one at a time and restarting at the top of the list when everyone has been given a corpse to loot. Any items of or above the 'Loot Quality' level set by the fellowship leader need to be assigned to members of the party by the party leader.
